name: opabex2
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0, wff w1

stmt.origin: ssexd(copab(s0, s1, w1), cxp(c0, c2), universe, w0)
stmt.pretty: ssexd({ < s0, s1 > | w1 }, (c0 × c2), universe, w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(copab(s0, s1, w1), universe))
-| wi(w0, wcel(cxp(c0, c2), universe))
-| wi(w0, wss(copab(s0, s1, w1), cxp(c0, c2)))

-| wi(w0, wss(copab(s0, s1, w1), cxp(c0, c2)))
